--- select_tablesample_with_cross_join.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers A
  CROSS JOIN
  Singers B
  TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   11,
      Source: &ast.Join{
        Op:   "CROSS JOIN",
        Left: &ast.TableName{
          Table: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 18,
            NameEnd: 25,
            Name:    "Singers",
          },
          As: &ast.AsAlias{
            As:    -1,
            Alias: &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 26,
              NameEnd: 27,
              Name:    "A",
            },
          },
        },
        Right: &ast.TableName{
          Table: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 43,
            NameEnd: 50,
            Name:    "Singers",
          },
          As: &ast.AsAlias{
            As:    -1,
            Alias: &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 51,
              NameEnd: 52,
              Name:    "B",
            },
          },
          Sample: &ast.TableSample{
            TableSample: 55,
            Method:      "BERNOULLI",
            Size:        &ast.TableSampleSize{
              Lparen: 77,
              Rparen: 88,
              Value:  &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 78,
                ValueEnd: 80,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "90",
              },
              Unit: "PERCENT",
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers A CROSS JOIN Singers B TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)
